title: HTTP/2 on a server with a listener
body:
I am trying to enable HTTP/2 on a server that is started using a net.Listener but it doesn't work. It only works on HTTP/1.1 mode.
http://play.golang.org/p/muebCalxpl

But when I set the http.Server.TLSConfig the HTTP/2 is enabled.
http://play.golang.org/p/HhPJA0EfEb

Is this the correct behavior? Why the server doesn't use the tls.Config of the net.Listener?

I'm using Go 1.6 on Linux amd/64.
